summary: Completed comprehensive testing of expense tracker application. Backend APIs are 100% functional with all 15 endpoints working correctly. Frontend core functionality is working well with successful authentication, sheet management, expense CRUD operations, and navigation. Main issue identified: data visualization charts (pie, bar, line) are not rendering despite chart containers being present.

ui_bugs.issue: Pie chart and bar chart not rendering despite chart containers being present
Modal overlay occasionally blocks clicks during category selection

issues: Console warnings about missing DialogContent descriptions

passed_tests: User registration with email, password, and name
JWT token authentication and protected routes
Create new expense sheet with name and month
View all expense sheets on dashboard
Add expenses to sheet with date, category, description, amount
All 15 backend API endpoints working correctly
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix data visualization charts (pie, bar, line charts) not rendering. Charts containers are present but Recharts components are not displaying. This is a high priority issue as data visualization is a core feature. Also fix modal overlay issues that occasionally block user interactions.
